## ggplot, lattice and graphics comparision

```{r setup}
data("EuStockMarkets")
library(tidyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
library(lattice)

timings = data.frame()

```

## Time series plot

```{r}

df <- cbind(as.data.frame(EuStockMarkets), data.frame(date=as.vector(time(EuStockMarkets))))
gathered_df <- gather(df, stock, price, -date)

ggplot_time <- system.time({
  ggplot_plot <- ggplot(gathered_df, aes(x=date, y=price, color=stock)) + geom_line()
})[['elapsed']]

ggplot_plot
ggplot_time

lattice_time <- system.time({
  lattice_plot <- xyplot(price~date, data = gathered_df, groups = stock, type='l')
})[['elapsed']]
lattice_plot
lattice_time

plot_with_base_r <- function (){
  
  # 2. Plot a first line
  plot(df[['date']], df[['DAX']], type = "l", frame = FALSE, pch = 18,
       col = "red", xlab = "x", ylab = "y")
  
  # 3. Add a second line
  lines(df[['date']], df[['SMI']], pch = 18, col = "blue", type = "l")
  # 3. Add a second line
  lines(df[['date']], df[['CAC']], pch = 18, col = "green", type = "l")
  # 3. Add a second line
  lines(df[['date']], df[['FTSE']], pch = 18, col = "purple", type = "l")
  
  # 4. Add a legend to the plot and set legend lty
  legend("topleft", legend = c("DAX", "SMI", "CAC", "FTSE"),
         col = c("red", "blue", "green", "purple"), lty = 1:4, cex = 0.8)
  
}

base_r_time <- system.time(plot_with_base_r())[['elapsed']]

timings <- rbind(timings, data.frame(base_r_time = base_r_time, ggplot_time = ggplot_time, lattice_time = lattice_time, type='lines'))

```

# Barplots
```{r plot}
df <- data.frame(y=c(1, 5 ,6 , 9 , 0 , 2), x=c('a', 'b', 'c', 'd', 'e', 'f'))
ggplot_time <- system.time( {
  ggplot_bar_chart <- ggplot(df, aes(x=x,y=y)) + geom_bar(stat='identity')
})[['elapsed']]
ggplot_bar_chart

lattice_time <- system.time( {lattice_plot <- barchart(y~x, data=df)} )[['elapsed']]
lattice_plot
base_r_time <- system.time( barplot(df[['y']], names=df[['x']]) )[['elapsed']]
timings <- rbind(timings, data.frame(base_r_time = base_r_time, ggplot_time = ggplot_time, lattice_time = lattice_time, type='barplot'))

```
# Density plot

```{r}
n <- 10000
df <- data.frame(x = rnorm(n, mean=0, sd=1), 
                 y = rnorm(n, mean=1, sd=3), 
                 z = rnorm(n, mean=0.5, sd=0.25)) 
gathered_data <- gather(df, key, value)

ggplot_time <- system.time({
  ggplot_output <- ggplot(gathered_data, aes(x=value, fill=key, alpha=0.5)) + geom_density()
})[['elapsed']]
ggplot_output

lattice_time <- system.time({
  lattice_output <- densityplot(~value, data=gathered_data, groups=key, plot.points=FALSE, auto.key=TRUE)
})[['elapsed']]
lattice_output

base_r_density <- function(){
  plot(density(df[['x']], from=-5, to=5), col='red', ylim=c(0,2), xlim=c(-5,5), main='density', xlab='x')
  lines(density(df[['y']], from=-5, to=5), col='blue')
  lines(density(df[['z']], from=-5, to=5), col='green')
  legend("topleft", legend = colnames(df),  col = c("red", "blue", "green"), lty = 1:4, cex = 0.8)
}

base_r_time <- system.time(base_r_density())[['elapsed']]

timings <- rbind(timings, data.frame(base_r_time = base_r_time, ggplot_time = ggplot_time, lattice_time = lattice_time, type='density plot'))

```

# box plot
```{r}
n <- 10000
df <- data.frame(x = rnorm(n, mean=0, sd=1), 
                 y = rnorm(n, mean=1, sd=3), 
                 z = rnorm(n, mean=0.5, sd=0.25)) 
gathered_data <- gather(df, key, value)

ggplot_time <- system.time({
  ggplot_output <- ggplot(gathered_data, aes(x=key, y=value)) + geom_boxplot()
})[['elapsed']]
ggplot_output

lattice_time <- system.time({
  lattice_output <- bwplot(value~key, data=gathered_data, groups=key, plot.points=FALSE)
})[['elapsed']]
lattice_output

base_r_density <- function(){
  boxplot(value~key, data = gathered_data)
}

base_r_time <- system.time(base_r_density())[['elapsed']]

timings <- rbind(timings, data.frame(base_r_time = base_r_time, ggplot_time = ggplot_time, lattice_time = lattice_time, type='box plot'))
```



# points


```{r}
  data(iris)
  ggplot_scatter_time <- system.time({
    ggplot_scatter_plot <- ggplot(iris, aes(x=Sepal.Length, y=Sepal.Width, color=Species)) + 
      geom_point()
  })[['elapsed']]
  ggplot_scatter_plot
  
  base_r_scatter <- function(){
    plot(iris[['Sepal.Length']], iris[['Sepal.Width']], pch=21, bg=c("red","green","blue")[unclass(iris$Species)], 
         main="Iris", xlab='Sepal.Length', ylab='Sepal.Width' )
    legend("topleft", legend = unique(factor(iris$Species)),  col = c("red", "green", "blue"), lty = 1:4, cex = 0.8)
  }
  
  base_r_scatter_time <- system.time(base_r_scatter())[['elapsed']]
  
  lattice_scatter_time <- system.time({
    lattice_scatter <- xyplot(Sepal.Width~Sepal.Length, data=iris, group=Species, auto.key = TRUE)
  })[['elapsed']]
  lattice_scatter
  
  timings <- rbind(timings, data.frame(base_r_time = base_r_scatter_time, ggplot_time = ggplot_scatter_time, lattice_time = lattice_scatter_time, type='scatter'))
  
```
# Results

```{r}
gather(timings, method, time, - type) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x=type, y=time, fill=method)) + geom_bar(stat='identity', position='dodge')
```
